name: Thieves Destiny
description:
Story of game - A crazy thief decided to rob a Bank Blindfolded so now his crew members with the help of time stop device and drones are helping him completing the crazy stunt. 

 Ayaan Chembayil - Artist 

Abdul Qadir - Level Designer

 Khush Santoki - Developer 

Bhavya Jain - Developer

 Dewang Jaybhaye - Developer

Special Thanks to Parth Lakhani for the UI sprites 

Dhairya Tripathi for the In Game Music
